hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Awf bin Malik said:"The Messenger of Allah came out with a stick in his hand, and a man had hung up a bunch of dry and bad dates. He started hitting that bunch of dates and said: 'I wish that the one who gave this Sadaqah had given something better than this, for the one who gave these dry, bad dates will eat dry, bad dates on the Day of Resurrection

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِهِ عَزَّ وَجَلَّ { وَلاَ تَيَمَّمُوا الْخَبِيثَ مِنْهُ تُنْفِقُونَ }
chapter.eng-name: The Saying Of Allah, The Mighty And Sublime: "And Do Not Aim At That Which Is bad To Spend From"
